title: Simple Linear Regression From Scratch
subtitle: Regression Model from Scratch in Python Using the Gradient Descent
description: Building a Univariate Linear Regression Model from Scratch using Python and Pandas, following the tutorial provided by NeuralNine

title: Multiple Linear Regression From Scratch
subtitle: Regression Model from Scratch in Python Using the Normal Equations
description: Building a Multivariate Linear Regression Model from Scratch using Python, Pandas and Numpy. Included is an example of computing the Fama-French Beta Estimation using the regression model from a pre-cleaned dataset.

title: Textbook Notes - Exploratory Data Analysis of Sampled Stock Returns Part 1
subtitle: Notes from Data Analysis for Financial Engineering Ch 4
description: Some Useful Methods of Analyzing Samples for all kinds of statistics, this notebook aims to share some ways that sample distributions can be analyzed.

title: Histograms and the KDE Python Exercises - Exploratory Data Analysis of Sampled Stock Returns Part 2
subtitle: Applying the Notes from the Textbook to Python
description: Pythonic Applications of the Exploratory Data Analysis Notes, here sample distributions are examined with Histograms and the Kernel Density Estimator.

title: Quantile-Quantile Plots - Exploratory Data Analysis of Sampled Stock Returns Part 3
subtitle: Applying the Notes from the Textbook to Python
description: Pythonic Applications of the Exploratory Data Analysis Textbook Notes. In this section, Normal Probability Plots, Half-Normal Plots, and Qunatile-Quantile Plots are created in Python using MatPlotLib, Seaborn, and Pandas.

title: Types of Stock Returns - Textbook Notes and Python Examples
subtitle: Notes from Data Analysis for Financial Engineering Ch 4
description: Comparing stock returns using net, root and log returns. Notes from the textbook chapter are mixed with Python Cells showing the calculation of these returns, and a comparison of 3 semiconductor companies is performed using their calculated returns.

title: Visualizing Stocks using MPLFinance Candle Charts
subtitle: Learning MPLFinance
description: This notebook is an exploration of MPLFinance, a powerful extension of MatPlotLib that provides finance-specific plotting tools for stock data.

title: Web Scraping in BeautifulSoup4
subtitle: Following a Tutorial to learn Web Scraping
description: Web Scraping is a powerful tool to extract data that is otherwise inaccessible using APIs. This notebook is a code-along with a BS4 tutorial I found on Youtube.

title: CAPM Estimation
description: Performing Beta Estimation using Simple Linear Regression and the CAPM Model.
